languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} from any distance.
A character who becomes the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} заставляет союзника действовать на пределе возможностей, повышая его {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} на +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} на 1 раунд. Кроме того, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} офицера можно применять к цели Приказа командира на любом расстоянии. Персонаж, к которому применен Приказ командира, не может стать целью этой способности в течение 2 следующих {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} заставляет союзника действовать на пределе возможностей, повышая его {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} на +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Кроме того, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} офицера можно применять к цели {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g} на любом расстоянии.
Персонаж, к которому применен {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g}, не может стать целью этой способности в течение 2 следующих раундов.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}强迫一名盟友全力作战，使其所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此外，军官所有{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以直接对受{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}影响的盟友释放，无视距离。
受{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}影响的盟友，在接下来的两轮内无法再次成为此能力的目标。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} from any distance.
A character who becomes the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}强迫一名盟友{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}{/g}全力作战，使其所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 此外，军官所有{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以直接对受指挥之声影响的盟友释放，无视距离。 受指挥之声影响的盟友，在接下来的两轮内无法再次成为此能力的目标。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} fuerza a un aliado hasta su límite, aumentando sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} en +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Además, todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del oficial pueden aplicarse al objetivo de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} desde cualquier distancia.
Un personaje seleccionado como objetivo de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} no puede volver a seleccionarse como objetivo de esta capacidad durante los próximos 2 asaltos.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} from any distance.
A character who becomes the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} bringt einen Verbündeten dazu, sich ins Zeug zu legen, wodurch seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} erhöht werden.
Ferner können alle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offiziers aus beliebiger Distanz auf das Ziel von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} angewendet werden.
Ein Charakter, der mit {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} belegt wird, kann in den nächsten 2 Runden nicht mehr mit dieser Fähigkeit anvisiert werden.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} from any distance.
A character who becomes the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} bringt einen Verbündeten dazu, sich {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}ins Zeug zu legen{/g}, wodurch seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} erhöht werden. Ferner können alle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offiziers aus beliebiger Distanz auf das Ziel von Stimme des Kommandos angewendet werden. Ein Charakter, der mit Stimme des Kommandos belegt wird, kann in den nächsten 2 Runden nicht mehr mit dieser Fähigkeit anvisiert werden.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} bringt einen Verbündeten dazu, sich {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}ins Zeug zu legen{/g}, wodurch seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} erhöht werden. Ferner können alle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offiziers aus beliebiger Distanz auf das Ziel von Stimme des Kommandos angewendet werden. Ein Charakter, der mit Stimme des Kommandos belegt wird, kann in den nächsten 2 Runden nicht mehr mit dieser Fähigkeit anvisiert werden.

languages.text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} oblige un allié à se surpasser, augmentant ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
De plus, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'officier peuvent être appliquées à la cible de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare.
Un personnage visé par {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} ne peut plus être la cible de cette capacité pendant les 2 rounds suivants.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} from any distance.
A character who becomes the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} oblige un allié à se {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}surpasser{/g}, augmentant ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. De plus, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'officier peuvent être appliquées à la cible de Voix du commandement, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare. Un personnage visé par Voix du commandement ne peut plus être la cible de cette capacité pendant les 2 rounds suivants.

L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} oblige un allié à se {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}surpasser{/g}, augmentant ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. De plus, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'officier peuvent être appliquées à la cible de Voix du commandement, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare. Un personnage visé par Voix du commandement ne peut plus être la cible de cette capacité pendant les 2 rounds suivants.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は味方に全力戦闘を強制し、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}増加させる。 さらに、指揮の声のターゲットには、士官のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がどこからでも適用できるようになる。 指揮の声のターゲットになったキャラクターは、以降2ラウンドの間、再度本アビリティのターゲットにはできない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は味方に全力戦闘を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}強制{/g}し、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}増加させる。 さらに、指揮の声のターゲットには、士官のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がどこからでも適用できるようになる。 指揮の声のターゲットになったキャラクターは、以降2ラウンドの間、再度本アビリティのターゲットにはできない。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は味方に全力戦闘を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}強制{/g}し、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}増加させる。 さらに、指揮の声のターゲットには、士官のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がどこからでも適用できるようになる。 指揮の声のターゲットになったキャラクターは、以降2ラウンドの間、再度本アビリティのターゲットにはできない。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir dost birime sınırlarını zorlatarak 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} onun {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerini{/g} +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} kadar artırır.
Subay, buna ek olarak tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g}'nün hedefine herhangi bir mesafeden uygulayabilir.
{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetinin hedefi olan bir karakter, ilerideki 2 raunt boyunca tekrar bu kabiliyetin hedefi olamaz.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully push themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} from any distance.
A character who becomes the target of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir dost birime sınırlarını zorlatarak 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} onun {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerini{/g} +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} kadar artırır. Subay, buna ek olarak tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} Emir Sözü'nün hedefine herhangi bir mesafeden uygulayabilir. Emir Sözü kabiliyetinin hedefi olan bir karakter, ilerideki 2 raunt boyunca tekrar bu kabiliyetin hedefi olamaz.
